document.full_text: tyler zeller scored 32 points, john henson added 28, and north carolina used its hulking size to overcame sloppiness against scrappy long island university.
document.title: east: north carolina 102, l.i.u. 87: north carolina rolls over l.i.u. in return to tournament
lines_and_colors: tyler zeller scored 32 points, john henson added 28, and north carolina used its hulking size to overcame sloppiness against scrappy long island university.
